**Master of Engineering (Mechatronics and Automatic Control)** ============================================================== > This program aims to produce professionals with advanced knowledge and skills in the field of **Mechatronics and Automatic Control** in line with the development of today’s communications technology. The program will also provide exposure in entrepreneurship and sustainability in technology and engineering to further contribute to the generation of talent and transformation leaders according to the current needs of the country. Intake March/October\* every year --------------------------------- [Apply Now](https://admission.utm.my/apply-now/) * Application for March\* intake is open from September to November _(for international student)_ and from September to December _(for local student)._ * Application for October\* intake is open from March to June _(for international student)_ and from March to July _(for local student)._ _\*Implementation during COVID-19 Pandemic._ Graduates will be able to future-proof their engineering careers or become entrepreneurs in the telecommunications, electronics, and oil and gas industries **Career Prospect** ------------------- ![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/comm_img03_prospect.png "comm_img03_prospect") **Study Mode, Duration and Scheme** ----------------------------------- * [Study Mode & Duration](https://fke.utm.my/mechatronics-and-automatic-control#) * [Full Time (On-campus) Scheme](https://fke.utm.my/mechatronics-and-automatic-control#) * [Full Time (Off-campus) Scheme](https://fke.utm.my/mechatronics-and-automatic-control#) | | | | | --- | --- | --- | | Mode (Full time) | Minimum Duration | Maximum Duration | | On-campus (at UTM JB) | 2 semesters +1 short semester | 4 Years (8 Semesters) | | Off-campus (at UTM JB/KL) | 2 Years (4 Semesters) | 4 Years (8 Semesters) | | | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **COURSE** | **SEMESTER
